name: Cave Plague
description:
A game jam game created in 2 days for RGDC Halloween Game Jam 2022!

After searching the caves for potion ingredients, Dr. Minty found the last thing he needed for his new plague gun. Upon turning to the exit, he found the way out blocked by a tangle of vines. It's up to you to guide Dr. Minty out and make sure he reaches safety!

Controls A/DMoveSpaceJumpMouse & Left ClickAim & ShootRQuick RestartEscapeMain Menu Credits

Programming/Level Design by https://armedturret.itch.io/

Art/Music by https://pretzol.itch.io
